clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in right lung upper lobe with SUVmax 4.4.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Focal increased uptake in right lung upper lobe, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
